remarks: Expand out the set differences from ~ isirred .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
isirred2.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
isirred2.2 $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
isirred2.3 $e |- I = ( Irred ` R ) $.
isirred2.4 $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
isirred2 $p |- ( X e. I <-> ( X e. B /\ -. X e. U /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B ( ( x .x. y ) = X -> ( x e. U \/ y e. U ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d X x y $.
